WorkItem.Description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. load SimpleSample
2. expand element13
3. select element131
4. collapse element13 using the expander (careful not to change selection)
5. select any other element
6. expand element13 and observe element131 is still selected (error)
7. change selection again to any other element other than element131 and observe element131 still does not lose selection (error)
8. element131 will only lose selection if it is clicked on and then another node selected

The same thing happens with other nodes, not just the ones mentioned above.
WorkItem.Summary: Selections not deselecting if under collapsed node
